item.title: âœ… Last week's post
item.description:
Insanity is the exact repetition of the same action, over and over again, in the hope of a change.

Monday

On Monday, I was at school, after which I completed the necessary tasks, and rested in the evening.

Tuesday

On Tuesday, I attended classes at the institute, after which I went home, and then went to the volleyball section, rested in the evening.

Wednesday

On Wednesday, I was in class at the institute, the first pair for me was next to the main building, and the second was in the building of my faculty. I had a rest after college.

Thursday

On Thursday, I attended classes at the institute, after which I rested and prepared assignments for Friday.

Friday

On Friday, I attended language classes at the institute, after which I was at home doing laboratory work No. 8.

Saturday

On Saturday, I took distance classes, after which I had a volleyball section at the institute, after which I rested.

Sunday

Sunday was like a day off for me, and I also completed lab work No. 9.
